author: philip
msg: First stage of Issue #611. New 'svn rm' behaviour: remove files and
unversioned directories from wc, with modified or unversioned
resources requiring --force. Make 'svn mv WC1 WC2' (which effectively
does an rm) have the same behaviour and do the same check.
Note that versioned (previously committed) directories remain in the WC.
(erase_from_wc): New function to remove items from the wc.
(svn_wc_delete): Allow an unversioned path, reorganise and call
(svn_client__can_delete): New function to check for modified or
(svn_client_delete): Call svn_client__can_delete if force is not
(wc_to_wc_copy): Add force flag. Call svn_client__can_delete if
force is not set. Remove explicit file deletion.
(svn_client_copy): Pass TRUE for force to setup_copy.
(update_ignores_added): Adjust file contents to account for removal.
